title: Rent Ready!! Patio/Balcony, Dishwasher, Seasonal  Outdoor Pool
posting_body: Heatherstone Apartments in Tacoma, WAHeatherstone Apartments is a beautiful community located just south of Tacoma, Washington.
Our community is located in a quiet neighborhood near schools, parks, and restaurants.
We are also conveniently close to I-5, Hwy 512, and Joint-Base Lewis McChord AFB.
We are a pet-friendly community and are located nearby nature trails for exercising your four-legged friends.
During the summer months, residents enjoy swimming in the heated outdoor pool and relaxing at the community cabana.
Our state-of-the-art fitness center, sport-court and outdoor playgrounds are great places for residents to enjoy and get their exercise.
Flexible Monthly Payments with Flex Rent
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
